Name:
USS Prince
HMS Rajah
Fate:
Transferred to Royal Navy
Sold as a merchant ship; sold for scrap 1975
Class and type:
Bogue-class escort carrier (USA)
Ruler-class escort carrier (UK)
Propulsion: Steam turbines, one shaft, 8,500 shp (6.3 MW)
Armament:
2 × 4"/50, 5"/38 or 5"/51 guns
8 × twin 40 mm Bofors
35 × single 20 mm Oerlikon
